Q_DESC:
Ashu is supposed to compare distances but he is to lazy to use the relational operators so many times. So ,he plans to overload the <(less than) operator to perform all three actions of greater than, less than and equal to.

Create a class Distance with feet, inches as members of class and overload the < operator to help Ashu do the work.

Input:
First Line contains First Distance(Feet and Inches separated by space) 
Second Line contains Second Distance(Feet and Inches separated by space) 

Example:
Input :
12 10
11 10

Output:
First One is Greater
